{{cpp/chrono/title|1=operator=={{small|(std::chrono::month_weekday)}}}}
{{cpp/chrono/month_weekday/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|chrono}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|1=
constexpr bool operator==( const std::chrono::month_weekday&amp; x,
                           const std::chrono::month_weekday&amp; y ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

比较两个 {{tt|month_weekday}} 值 {{c|x}} 与 {{c|y}}。

{{cpp/note synthesized eq}}

=== 返回值 ===
{{c|1=x.month() == y.month() &amp;&amp; x.weekday_indexed() == y.weekday_indexed()}}

=== 示例 ===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;chrono&gt;
 
int main()
{
    constexpr auto mwdi1{std::chrono::March/std::chrono::Friday[1]};

    constexpr auto mwdi2
    {
        std::chrono::month_weekday
        {
            std::chrono::month(3), std::chrono::weekday(5)[1]
        }
    };

    static_assert(mwdi1 == mwdi2);
}
}}
